subtitle.home: Specialist lawyer for: Tenancy and condominium law / social law

content.home:
Due to Mr Hubert Hinkelmann's professional experience, the law firm focuses primarily on civil and social law and is aimed at private and commercial clients.

The range of activities includes out-of-court advice, representation and contract drafting, as well as litigation, including any necessary subsequent enforcement proceedings.

Cost transparency is an important element of legal advice. Before a mandate is assigned and before further measures are initiated, the costs incurred are explained to you in detail.

Continuous further training, the use of modern and up-to-date IT and office technology, a well-stocked and constantly updated legal library and internet access enable the law firm as a service provider to represent the interests of its clients quickly and reliably.
content.aboutTraining: 1986-1993;Law studies at the WWU-Münster{'|'}1993-1996;Legal clerkship at the Regional Court of Münster
content.aboutPractice: 1997-2000;Lawyer and legal advisor for a tenants' association in Dessau{'|'}Since 2001;Self-employed in own law firm{'|'}Since 2005;Admission as a lawyer at the Higher Regional Court of Hamm{'|'}Since 2011;Specialist lawyer for tenancy and condominium law{'|'}Since 2014;Specialist lawyer for social law
